title: Boy, 15, accidentally shoots 13-year-old friend
content:
PHOENIX - A 13-year-old boy was accidentally shot by his 15-year-old friend overnight Tuesday near 39th Avenue and Thomas Road, police said.
Investigators tell 12 News that the 15-year-old brought a rifle to his 13-year-old friend's house. While trying to unload the rifle, the gun went off, hitting 13-year-old in the abdomen.
The child was rushed to the hospital and is expected to survive.
There's no word on what charges could be filed.
Copyright 2016 KPNX
